channel.title: V2d on VirtualMachinery
channel.description: Recent content in V2d on VirtualMachinery

item.title: VMware Validated Designs announced
item.description: Sometime yesterday, VMware announced the existence of VMware Validated Designs, which are a series of architecture designs validated by VMware experts. These appear to be a number of fluid designs (sorry to use a brave liquid word there but you’ll see what I mean) which will be updated regularly, meaning that the design principles espoused within will not be stuck at a single release version and more importantly will not be stuck at a single product.
